description: Join multiple audio streams into multi-channel output.
name: join

options.description: Number of input streams. (from 1 to INT_MAX) (default 2)
options.name: inputs

options.description: Channel layout of the output stream. (default "stereo")
options.name: channel_layout

options.description: A comma-separated list of channels maps in the format 'input_stream.input_channel-output_channel.
options.name: map
